PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long
INVALID_PARAMETERS: Sorry, the request could not be processed as because of invalid parameters.
NOT_ALLOWED:
Sorry, the action you tried to perform is not allowed.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
NOT_AUTHORIZED: Sorry, you are not authorized to perform this action.
NOT_FOUND:
Sorry, no entry could be found for the specified criteria.
If you feel this is not correct, kindly call support.
PASSWORD_NOT_UPDATED: Some error occurred while changing the password
GENERAL_EROOR: Sorry! Something went wrong with the request. Please try again later.
BAD_REQUEST: Bad request. Please check your input and try again.
GOOGLE_BUCKET_FILE_UPLOAD_ERROR: An Error in File Uploading on Google
USER_EXIST: User already exists in the system
USER_NOT_EXIST: User does not exist in the system
USER_DISABLED: Your account has been disabled. Please contact the administrator for further assistance.
INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid credentials. Please check your username and password.
USER_ROLE_EXIST: User role already exists in the system.
USER_ROLE_DELETE_ERROR: User role cannot be deleted as it is associated with one or more users in the system.
USER_ROLE_NOT_EXIST: User role does not exist in the system.
VENDOR_EXIST: Reseller already exist in the system
VENDOR_DELETE_ERROR: Reseller cannot be deleted as it has associated customers in the system.
VENDOR_EMAIL_EXIST_DIFF_USER: Email already exist in the system with different User
VENDOR_NOT_EXIST: Reseller does not exist in the system
LOCAL_VENDOR_EXIST: Vendor already exist in the system
lOCAL_VENDOR_EMAIL_EXIST_DIFF_USER: Email already exist in the system with different Vendor
LOCAL_VENDOR_DELETE_ERROR: Vendor cannot be deleted as it has associated Inventries in the system.
LOCAL_VENDOR_NOT_EXIST: Vendor does not exist in the system
CUSTOMER_EXIST: Customer already exists in the system
CUSTOMER_DELETE_ERROR: Customer cannot be deleted as it has associated branches in the system.
CUSTOMER_NOT_EXIST: Customer does not exist in the system
BRANCH_EXIST: Branch already exists in the system
BRANCH_DELETE_ERROR: Branch cannot be deleted as it has associated machines in the system.
BRANCH_NOT_EXIST: Branch does not exist in the system
BRAND_EXIST: Brand already exists in the system
BRAND_NOT_EXIST: Brand does not exist in the system
BRAND_DELETE_ERROR: InventryBrand cannot be deleted as it has associated inventries in the system.
INVENTRY_TYPE_EXIST: InventryType already exists in the system
INVENTRY_TYPE_DELETE_ERROR: InventryType cannot be deleted as it has associated inventry Brands in the system.
INVENTRY_TYPE_NOT_EXIST: InventryType does not exist in the system
INVENTRY_SERIAL_EXIST: Serial Number already exists in the system
INVENTRY_DELETE_ERROR: Inventory cannot be deleted as it has associated with Machine in the system.
INVENTRY_INVOICE_EXIST: Invoice Number already exists in the system
INVENTORY_NOT_EXIST: Inventory does not exist in the system
MACHINE_EXIST: Machine already exists in the system
MACHINE_NOT_EXIST: Machine does not exist in the system
